name: Matrix Life Science - PhytoLite Natural Plant Sterols
description: Matrix Life Science offers PhytoLite Natural Plant Sterols - organic, unblended phytosterols that are economical and profitable. Customizable per client needs for barrier repair formulations. Natural plant sterols provide cholesterol-alternative barrier support with anti-inflammatory benefits. Organic certification supports clean beauty positioning.
notes: Organic, unblended phytosterols provide clean beauty appeal. Economical and profitable for formulators. Customizable per client needs allows formulation flexibility. Natural plant sterols support barrier repair with anti-inflammatory benefits. Clean label positioning.
